instanceVariables.name: trailFadeOutTime
instanceVariables.desc: The time in seconds for a spawned "shadow" to fade out

instanceVariables.name: trailColor
instanceVariables.desc: The "R,G,B" value of the shadows. This input are always 3 number values separated by ",". For example the input "100,0,0" will give you a red shadow

instanceVariables.name: trailOverObject
instanceVariables.desc: True if the shadows should be drawn over the objects

instanceVariables.name: trailFrequency
instanceVariables.desc: The frequency in seconds that the shadows will spawn

instanceVariables.name: trailEnabled
instanceVariables.desc: Set this to true if you want the object to spawn shadow trail
